Package com.logmein.interview

Class AbstractTimeServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logmein.interview.AbstractTimeServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DateService, DateTimeService, TimeService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPTimeServer, UDPTimeServer
    public abstract class AbstractTimeServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements DateService, DateTimeService, TimeService
    The Class AbstractTimeServer implements shared behavior of UDPTimeServer and TCPTimeServer. It provides implementation for the service interfaces and provides a request handler for the 3 requests types to ensure consistent behavior on both TCP and UDP.

      • requestHandler

        public java.lang.String requestHandler​(java.lang.String request)
                                throws UnknownRequestException
        Request handler provides implementation behavior for responding to requests. The 3 possibles requests types are `date`, `time` and `datetime`. The response will be an appropriate ISO 8601 compliant formatted string.
        Parameters:
        request - either of `date`, `time` or `datetime`
        Returns:
        an ISO 8601 compliant date or time formatted string
        Throws:
        UnknownRequestException - thrown when any other request occur
